title: Executive Order 8187-Amendment of Subdivision VI, Schedule A, of the Civil Service Rules
content: By virtue of and pursuant to the authority vested in me by paragraph EIGHTH, subdivision SECOND, section 2 of the Civil Service Act (22 Stat. 403, 404), Subdivision VI of Schedule A of the Civil Service Rules is hereby amended by adding thereto the following paragraph:
"6. During the period beginning July 1, 1939 and ending June 30, 1940, all positions in the Federal Bureau of Investigation, except fingerprint classifiers."
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 8187-Amendment of Subdivision VI, Schedule A, of the Civil Service Rules Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/368695
